definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: One question asked whether they believe that mentaldisorders are overdiagnosed in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個問到是否美國精神疾病已過度治療了？。

sentences.english: Until recently, mental illness is a taboo topic in China.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，在中國精神疾病仍然是一個忌諱的話題。

sentences.english: Many psychiatric disorders begin well before adulthood.
sentences.chinese: 許多精神疾病發端於成年期之前。

sentences.english: In the current society, insomnia is a common mental illness.
sentences.chinese: 在當前社會中，失眠病是一種常見的精神疾病。

sentences.english: As Dr Osei put it, mental illness weakens the quality of life of its victims.
sentences.chinese: 就像Osei醫生所說，精神疾病降低患者生活質量。

sentences.english: Capitalism, perhaps at its most remorseless, is a physical manifestation of psychopathy.
sentences.chinese: 冷酷無情的資本主義正是精神疾病的物質表現。

sentences.english: These days, lobotomies are no longer performed on the mentally ill.
sentences.chinese: 如今，額葉切除術已經不再用於精神疾病的治療。

sentences.english: The absolute risk differences, however, were similar for the epilepsy and psychiatric indications.
sentences.chinese: 但是癲癇和精神疾病的絕對風險的差異是相似的。

sentences.english: The other group of 251 had parents with no mental health problems.
sentences.chinese: 另一組則是家長沒有精神疾病問題的251名兒童。

sentences.english: SenilePeriod the symptom of mental disease is extremely flabby calm, be fantasticality sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 老年期精神疾病的症狀極不穩定，有時是變化無常的。

sentences.english: There is still a huge stigma attached to having a mental illness.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的污名仍高懸在精神疾病患者頭上。

sentences.english: A number of women with severe PMS may have an underlying psychiatric disorder.
sentences.chinese: 患有嚴重經前綜合症的很多女性有潛在精神疾病。

sentences.english: Now Sanders wants to share her story in an effort to tear down the stigma of mental illness.
sentences.chinese: 現在桑德斯想分享她的故事以洗去精神疾病的陰影。

sentences.english: Mental disorders are among the strongest predictors of suicide attempts and suicide deaths.
sentences.chinese: 精神疾病屬於自殺未遂和自殺死亡最重要的預測因子。

sentences.english: In the Fidgety versions of the tales, children with mental health disorders become the heroes.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的焦躁版童話中，精神疾病患兒成了英雄。

pinyin: bian1 yuan2 xing4 ren2 ge2 zhang4 ai4
